DOC.brief_summary: The current study continuation study `` Effect early rehabilitation patient acute aSAH '' approve Regional Committee Medical Research Ethics , South-East Norway , archive number 2011/2189 , Clinical Trials number 0925-0586 ( Clinical Trials gov . identifier NCT01656317 ) . The original study prospective , control , interventional study comprise patient manage neuro-intermediate ward follow repair rupture intracranial aneurysm 2011-2012 . 157 patient sign informed consent form include study . Patients assess acute phase , well 3 12 month post ictus . The main research goal present study assess physical , cognitive emotional function 5 10 year aSAH 2011-2012 population . In addition also describe quality life work-status along time-course recovery acute sage aSAH chronic phase .
DOC.brief_title: Changes Physical , Cognitive Emotional Function 5 10 Years After Aneurysmal Subarachnoid Hemorrhage ( aSAH )
DOC.criteria: Patients aSAH treat Oslo University Hospital 20112012 Only patient sign informed consent form thereby include project `` Effect early rehabilitation patient acute subarachnoid hemorrhage '' ( Regional Committee Medical Research Ethics , SouthEast Norway , archive number 2011/2189 , Clinical Trials number 09250586 , Clinical Trials gov . identifier NCT01656317 ) ask participate . Exclusion criterion : Patients aSAH treat Oslo University Hospital 20112012 sign inform consent form project `` Effect early rehabilitation patient acute subarachnoid hemorrhage '' ( Regional Committee Medical Research Ethics , SouthEast Norway , archive number 2011/2189 , Clinical Trials number 09250586 , Clinical Trials gov . identifier NCT01656317 )
